camunda.cannot_convert: C2256 - The following value entered in the form is invalid: %{key}. Check if the key has the right value defined on the step json schema.
camunda.error: C2257 - Camunda returned an error for this task. Please try again. If the error persists, contact the support.
camunda.inexistent_value: C2255 - The form has at least one value that was not defined in one of the expressions defined in the process. Please check all the answeres and the process too.
camunda.invalid_value: C2253 - The value for the key defined in this expression is invalid: %{expression}. Check if the key has the right value defined on the step json schema.
camunda.task_not_found: C2254 - This task does not exist anymore on camunda, the process instance was probably deleted.
camunda.unknown_property: C2252 - The following property is missing on the form: %{property}. Check if that key has been specified on the step json schema.

sap.error: There was an error on the request to SAP, please contact support with this information and the task url.

request_errors.timeout: S1251 - The request has timedout. Please try again and if the error persists, contact support.
